Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Darmanian Way, north of the Handmade Spices shop.
Room.LongDescription: Handmade Herbs and Spices provides its customers with a wide variety of rare herbs and spices, prepared specifically for your use, whether it be for cooking or for magic spells. Spices usually come in handy when trying to bribe guards in other cities, as some spices can be rarer than gold itself.
